actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 108-702.

official_title: A bill to limit the royalty on soda ash.

summary.text: Amends the Mineral Leasing Act regarding leases and royalties to provide that the royalty rate applicable to any soda ash lease shall be two percent during the five-year period beginning on the date of enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to limit the royalty on soda ash.
